activities: Vestige Ltd. receives Personal Information and/or is provided access, by agreement, court order, agency order to Personal Information only in connection with the investigation of events associated with the identification of legal claims and defenses and/or the response to litigation, compliancy and regulatory matters, corporate governance issues, and the management and administration of electronic evidence resident upon electronic media either owned and controlled by Vestige’s clients, or to which access is procured by agreement and/or lawful court or administrative agency order.  Absent access provided as above, Vestige does not collect or use Personal Information.  When access is provided as above, Vestige and Vestige EU Client Companies discharges all obligations, if any, to notify EU Based Employees about the purposes for which their Personal Information is collected and used in a particular matter. Vestige Ltd. uses Personal Information only for investigations, or when required in the course of judicial or administrative proceedings, subject to all nondisclosure safeguards available.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line; on-line; manually processed data, client human resources data
recoursemech:
International Centre for Dispute Resolution/American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
For HR data: EU DPA & Swiss FDPIC
